title-group.article-title: Low–Heat Rejection Engines — A Concept Review

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1989 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: A comprehensive review of low-heat rejection engine concepts is presented. Areas examined include the materials being considered for these engines; fuels including coal; the effects of high temperature upon emissions; tribology with ceramics; exhaust heat utilization systems; and applications of these engines. Inconsistencies in the literature are discussed.
